root: ^Of course! Didn't they ever tell you? A cat has nine lives.
^But! How? Where were you all this time?
^That little devil had me trapped in his demon realm.
^We've been locked in a game of cat and mouse for three months at least.
^My magical DJ powers kept him at bay for a while, but I was growing weak. I almost lost my groove but then...
^I heard your voice. I knew I had to muster up all of my strength and keep fighting. I could never let him get to you.
^All this time you were protecting me!
^I was doing what I do best. Scratching records! Music was that demon's only weakness.
^I guess he was no match for the Scratch Cats!
^You've got a lot of spunk, kid. I could never have defeated him without you.
^Me neither! I don't know what I would have done without you!
^You know, I don't want to sound like a broken record but... if you like working at the store, I have an opening!
